## Data scope summary

This section has demonstrated a few ways to perform an initial investigation of
the data available to answer a research question using the {galah} package. This
is a critical part of the research process, and should be conducted in the early
stages of your project. Keep in mind that this was just a small example of
examining available data, and our aim is to encourage readers to think
critically about their own data scope, building on the steps have presented
here. In the next section, we will explain how to download and save this data.
